DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to evaluate the pharmacokinetics (PK) of Dapagliflozin in pediatric subjects with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM)
DOC.brief_title: PK Study of Dapagliflozin in Pediatric Subjects With T2DM
DOC.detailed_description: Primary purpose: The primary purpose is to assess the pharmacokinetics of a single dose of Dapagliflozin in the range of 2.5 to 10 mg in pediatric subjects aged 10 to 17 years with T2DM
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of T2DM Male and female subjects ages 1017 Glycosylated Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) >6 to <10% Fasting plasma glucose (FPG) >240 mg/dL at screening Abnormal renal function Active liver disease and/or significant abnormal liver function
